section.name: Resin[2x|3x] Tasks
section.p: The resin2x and resin3x tasks start/stop Resin 2.x/3.x instances. Both tasks support the following parameters.

tr.td: The installation directory of the Resin server
The action to perform. Valid values are "start" and "stop" to respectively start and stop the container.
A container URL to poll to test if the container has been started/stopped. If specified the task waits until the container has completely started/stopped.
No. One of warfile and earfile.
No. One of warfile and earfile.
The configuration file to use instead of the default one
The TCP port that the container should listen to
The directory to which the container will be installed for the tests.
No (by default the system temporary directory is used)
Name of a file to write the output of the container to. If not specified, the standard output will be used
Whether output should be appended to or overwrite an existing file.

section.name: Examples
section.p: Start a Resin 3.x instance, wait for it to be started and stop it, waiting for it to be completely stopped:
section.source: <parallel> <resin3x dir="${cactus.home.resin3x}" action="start"/> <sequential> <waitfor> <http url="http://localhost:${cactus.port}"/> </waitfor> <resin3x dir="${cactus.home.resin3x}" action="stop"/> <waitfor> <not> <http url="http://localhost:${cactus.port}"/> </not> </waitfor> </sequential> </parallel>
